value.title: Announcing: Now it’s easier to find Power BI reports in Microsoft Teams tabs
value.excerpt: We’ve started to roll-out an update to the home experience in the Power BI app for Microsoft Teams. Users in Teams will see a new “In Teams” pivot on Power BI home that makes it easy to find Power BI tabs you’ve visited previously in Teams channels. Read the blog to learn all about it.

value.title: Quickly create reports from SharePoint lists
value.excerpt: Back in December, we launched a new create experience within the Power BI service that allowed you to quick explore your data with just a few clicks. Now, we’re excited to announce, as our first integration of this experience, the launch of our Power BI integration within SharePoint lists. This experience

value.title: Power BI introduces a bunch of new additions and improvements at Build 2021
value.excerpt: The premium version of Microsoft's data analytics platform is receiving real-time analytics and big data improvements, while Power BI Embedded now offers integration with Jupyter Notebooks.

value.title: Enabling intelligent experiences with Power BI for developers, data scientists, and data engineers
value.excerpt: Since our launch over five years ago, Microsoft Power BI has been enthusiastically adopted by developers across the spectrum. Today we have over three million active developers on Power BI—who harness the power of data, provide actionable insights, and deliver cloud-native intelligent experiences. Today,

value.title: Automate deployments with deployment pipelines API (preview)
value.excerpt: Deployment pipelines can be automated! With the first set of APIs, you can automate deployments or integrate the deployment process into familiar tools, like Azure Pipelines or GitHub Actions.

value.title: Announcing Power BI in Jupyter notebooks
value.excerpt: We’re excited to announce the release of Power BI in Jupyter notebooks. You can now tell compelling data stories with Power BI in Jupyter notebooks. Get your Power BI analytics in a Jupyter notebook with the new powerbiclient Python package. The new package lets you embed Power BI reports, dashboards,

value.title: Microsoft Power BI: Getting started with data visualization (free PDF)
value.excerpt: Power BI transforms data into useful information you can share with management, stakeholders, and other decision makers. This ebook presents an overview of Power BI capabilities and walks through ...

value.title: Best practice rules to improve your model᾿s performance and design v1.1
value.excerpt: See the latest version of the best practice rules to improve your model’s performance and design!

value.title: Power BI + Denodo = End-to-end security through Single Sign-On (SSO)
value.excerpt: Power BI integrates with cutting-edge big data, data warehouse, and data virtualization technologies, such as Denodo. The Denodo platform uses data virtualization on-premises and in the cloud to facilitate the adoption of a logical architecture or data fabric that can help to boost the productivity of

value.title: Learn, Connect, and Code at the Microsoft Build Summit! May 25th-27th, 2021
value.excerpt: Join the Power BI team and be inspired by community experts, learn best practices, and discover helpful resources with other attendees.

value.title: Announcing the new sharing experience
value.excerpt: We’re excited to announce a new sharing experience that allows sharing reports via links. Previously in the old experience, we supported sharing reports by granting direct access. For the new experience, reports can be shared via links in addition to direct access sharing.

value.title: Announcing support for backup and restore of Power BI datasets
value.excerpt: e are excited to announce the public preview of Backup and Restore for datasets in Power BI Premium and Premium per User (PPU). You can now use SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS), Analysis Services cmdlets for PowerShell, and other tools to perform backup and restore operations in Power BI via XMLA

value.title: Query Plan Visual for Power Query Online
value.excerpt: The Query Plan visual will allow you to understand what’s happening under the hood of your query with more details than the Step Folding indicator.

value.title: Microsoft Business Application Summit Recap
value.excerpt: There is a big chance you haven’t been able to catch all the news at MBAS or that some items just escaped your attention as they were drowned out by the next big thing. Don’t worry, we’ve got your back. In this post we do our best to recap what happened en provide links to the detail blog posts

value.title: Microsoft brings support for Power BI connected PivotTables to Excel on the web
value.excerpt: Microsoft announced that it is bringing support for Power BI connected PivotTables to Excel on the web. The feature on the desktop will also receive new features and performance improvements.

value.title: Introducing Goals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Organizations exist to achieve business objectives and in today’s data driven world, we know that progress is measured through data. However, this is often challenging as goal tracking systems are disconnected from your business data and often require manual updates. Not only that, but goals need to

value.title: Driving a data culture with Power BI– Empowering individuals, every team, and every organization
value.excerpt: Microsoft Business Applications Summit is one of my favorite events of the year. While we connect with our customers, our community, and our partners every day, at the Microsoft Business Applications Summit, we share some of our most important announcements on our strategy and roadmap. We prepare and

value.title: Community and third-party tools for developing enterprise-level Power BI and Analysis Services models
value.excerpt: Over the past few years, along with the high adoption rate of Power BI, also came the development of new tools by the Power BI community. Customers, partners, and individual users are contributing tools that improve the productivity of users creating models and reports in Power BI. It’s an evolution

value.title: Announcing the amazing Power BI customer stories sessions at the Microsoft Business Applications Summit
value.excerpt: We have an incredible lineup of customer story sessions at the upcoming Microsoft Business Applications Summit. Make sure to add these sessions to your backpack! You won’t want to miss them.

value.title: Power BI On-premises data gateway update brings PowerShell enhancements and more
value.excerpt: The April update for the Power BI On-premises data gateway brings enhanced PowerShell scripts, alongside general availability for single sign-on (SSO) for refresh, among other features.

value.title: On-premises data gateway April 2021 update is now available
value.excerpt: On-premises data gateway (standard and personal mode) release for April 2021

value.title: Join us for Microsoft Business Applications Summit! May 4th, 2021
value.excerpt: Join Arun Ulagaratchagan, Amir Netz and the Power BI team at Microsoft Business Applications Summit on May 4, 2021 for the Power BI two-part peek into the future. Hear the vision, learn about our journey, and see some amazing demos!
